topics.body:
Guys...I saw a crossover called Mystery Kids (Gravity Falls, Coraline, Paranorman, Invader Zim) And....and I... liked the idea.

I thought it was weird I was okay with IDWS crossovers like the Star Trek/Doctor Who, Mars Attacks crossthrough, the TMNT/ Ghostbusters thing. But this... You have to pull the trigger. I...I'm too far gone. 

!http://www.jouvanjohnson.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Gun-to-head.jpg!

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540bdf7f6368721916a70100#post_540bdf7f6368721916a70100

That explains so much of human history. Every day the body count grows and the ghosts just keep getting more and more pissed.
